CidrBlock.description: An IPv4 CIDR block to associate with the VPC.

Ipv6Pool.description: The ID of an IPv6 address pool from which to allocate the IPv6 CIDR block.

Id.description: The Id of the VPC associated CIDR Block.

Ipv6CidrBlock.description: An IPv6 CIDR block from the IPv6 address pool.

Ipv4IpamPoolId.description: The ID of the IPv4 IPAM pool to Associate a CIDR from to a VPC.

Ipv4NetmaskLength.description: The netmask length of the IPv4 CIDR you would like to associate from an Amazon VPC IP Address Manager (IPAM) pool.

Ipv6IpamPoolId.description: The ID of the IPv6 IPAM pool to Associate a CIDR from to a VPC.

Ipv6NetmaskLength.description: The netmask length of the IPv6 CIDR you would like to associate from an Amazon VPC IP Address Manager (IPAM) pool.

AmazonProvidedIpv6CidrBlock.description: Requests an Amazon-provided IPv6 CIDR block with a /56 prefix length for the VPC. You cannot specify the range of IPv6 addresses, or the size of the CIDR block.
